description: This file defines an interface ApiService for network operations related to user authentication and note management in a Kotlin-based Android app. It uses Retrofit annotations for HTTP requests to a REST API.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Kotlin interface defining REST API endpoints for authentication and note operations, utilizing Retrofit annotations.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Performs user signup by sending AuthRequest data to '/auth/signup' endpoint.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login by sending AuthRequest data to '/auth/login' endpoint.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Fetches list of notes, optionally filtering by a search term, with authorization header.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided NoteRequest data, authorized via token.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by note_id with new data, authorized via token.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note specified by note_id, authorized via token.
